name: Bean Valley
description:
Description

Welcome to Bean Valley! A rich and beautiful land full of puzzles and nature, Bean Valley was once populated, but now that its magical Shrines have lost their power, it has fallen into ruin. Explore the valley, solve its puzzles, and help bring life and power back into the mysterious expanse.

Features

- Main Quest

- Four unique and challenging puzzles

- Dialogue and Story

- Around 30 minutes of gameplay

- Relaxation and Surprises

- Confetti Boxes!

Extra Fun

If you've finished all the puzzles (or even if you haven't), you can still have extra fun enjoying the valley's secrets. You could go for a swim, try to find all the confetti boxes, try to get the Blacksmith to talk a bit more, enjoy the flower garden, or even try to leave the valley!

Compatibility, Controls, and Support

Bean Valley is compatible with Windows and Linux platforms, and was designed to run smoothly even on low-performance computers.  The controls are WASD for movement as well as 'E' for interactions. Menus are navigated using WASD and 'E' as well. If you notice any bugs or require any support for the game please message me on itch.io, thank you!
